summary: This mod makes the normal steel Armour into Black Steel Armour!
descriptionHtml:
This is a mod that re-textures Steel Armour into Black Steel Armour! View screenshots!!!!!

===INSTALL===
Just place the texture folder into your Steam>Steamapps>Common>Skyrim>Data folder and merge and replace everything!

===Black Steel Weapons===
Download Black Steel Weapons here!
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3388

===Black Iron Weapons===
Download Black Iron Weapons here! 
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3396
author: kclimer13
